name: Palace Raider (V)
Lore: 'Smugglers from many worlds are hunted by the Empire for providing arms and supplies to the Alliance. The Outer Rim is their refuge.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Adds 3 to power of anything he drives. When driving a transport vehicle, it moves for free and he adds one battle destiny. [Reflections 3] Wipe Them Out, All of Them ignores your non-unique aliens.',
